document: SQUAMISH SOCIALIZATION JOAN RYAN B. A.,Carleton University, 1957. M.Ed., University of Alaska, 1959. A THESIS SUBMITTED IN PARTIAL FULFILMENT OF THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in the Department of Anthropology and. Sociology We accept this thesis as conforming to the required standard THE UNIVERSITY OF BRITISH COLUMBIA September, 1973 Joan Ryan 1974
